fields.description:
h3. Problem

Titanium does not allow you to create & save images to a custom folders in camera roll for iOS 5

h3. Expected behavior:

Customer wants  to create & save images to a custom folders in camera roll for iOS 5

h3. More info:

The next link shows how to do this natively

http://www.touch-code-magazine.com/ios5-saving-photos-in-custom-photo-album-category-for-download/

h3. Helpdesk:
APP-459999
fields.summary: iOS: Create & Save Images to a Custom Folders in Camera Roll for iOS 5
fields.environment:
Simulator
Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.7.201112080131
Titanium SDK: 1.8.0.1.RC1, 1.8.0.1.v20111205164258 & 1.7.5
